metadata.title: YouTube Cards Explained 2025: How to Use Info Cards
metadata.description: Master YouTube cards to keep viewers watching. Types, placement timing, and best practices for info cards.

hero.headline: YouTube Cards: Keep Viewers Engaged
hero.subheadline: Interactive elements that link to more content. How to use cards effectively.

sections.content: YouTube cards are interactive elements that appear during your video. They can link to other videos, playlists, channels, or polls. Used strategically, cards keep viewers in your content ecosystem and boost session time. Here's how to use them effectively.

content.title: Video Cards
content.description: Link to specific videos. Point viewers to related content.

content.title: Playlist Cards
content.description: Link to playlists. Keep viewers watching your content longer.

content.title: Poll Cards
content.description: Quick surveys during video. Boost engagement, get feedback.

sections.title: Card Placement Best Practices
content: Time when you mention related content

faq.question: Do cards hurt retention?
faq.answer: Can if viewers click away. But keeping them in your content is better than leaving YouTube. Strategic cards improve session time.

faq.question: What's better: cards or end screens?
faq.answer: Both serve different purposes. Cards during video for relevant moments. End screens for subscription and next video. Use both.

faq.question: When should I add poll cards?
faq.answer: When asking viewers opinions. When you want engagement boost. When gathering content ideas. Don't overuseâ€”one poll per video maximum.

faq.question: Can I see card performance?
faq.answer: Yes. YouTube Studio shows card clicks and CTR per card. Analyze which cards perform best and learn from patterns.
